query: What must all authorized AI users avoid?
response: All authorized AI users must avoid not reporting any use of AI to the AI Safety Team if they believe the use case has not already been registered by the System Owner. (Document 5)
ground_truth: Inputting any federal nonpublic information into AI systems without authorization.
reasoning: The White Agent's response does not accurately reflect the ground truth answer, which specifically mentions avoiding the input of federal nonpublic information into AI systems without authorization. Instead, the response focuses on reporting to the AI Safety Team, which is not the core issue addressed in the ground truth.
